channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Metaverse Was Supposed to Be Your New Office. You’re Still on Zoom
item.description: Tech founders painted a vision of employees clocking into virtual workplaces. But the adoption of VR at work has been slow.

item.title: India clings to cheap feature phones as brands struggle to tap new smartphone buyers
item.description: India is struggling to get new smartphone buyers, as millions of Indians don’t go for an upgrade and continue to be on feature phones. © 2024 TechCrun...

item.title: Elon Musk ‘Fully Endorses’ Donald Trump After Deadly Rally Shooting
item.description: “I fully endorse President Trump and hope for his rapid recovery,” Elon Musk posted on X after the incident.

item.title: Meet the soft robots that can amputate limbs and fuse with other robots
item.description: Roboticists at The Faboratory at Yale University have developed a way for soft robots to replicate some of the more unsettling things that animals and...

item.title: Check Out WIRED’s Merch Store Refresh
item.description: Brand-new mugs, hats, and shirts are just a few of the things you’ll find in our store for branded merchandise, SHOP.WIRED.

item.title: If you’re an AT&T customer, your data has likely been stolen
item.description: This week, AT&T confirmed it will begin notifying around 110 million AT&T customers about a data breach that allowed cybercriminals to steal the phone...

item.title: The Best Hearing Aids for Seniors (2024)
item.description: These WIRED-tested hearing aids, approved by a licensed audiologist, will help seniors whose hearing has faded with age.

item.title: Here’s the full list of 28 US AI startups that have raised $100M or more in 2024
item.description: In the first half of 2024 alone, more than $35.5 billion was invested into AI startups globally. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal ...

item.title: Tesla’s Cheaper Long-Range Model 3 Is Back
item.description: Plus: The Ford Capri returns as an EV, Samsung workers are on indefinite labor strike, and the market for anti-obesity drugs is messier than ever.

item.title: Whistleblowers accuse OpenAI of ‘illegally restrictive’ NDAs
item.description: Whistleblowers have accused OpenAI of placing illegal restrictions on how employees can communicate with government regulators, according to a letter ...
